```{r analyze}
library(cytofkit)
file = "~/temp/fcs/2016-05-20_PANEL 2_ZF_panel 2_F1632217_009.fcs"

data_transformed <- cytof_exprsExtract(fcsFile = file, markers = parameters, 
                                       comp = FALSE, 
                                       transformMethod = "cytofAsinh")

```

```{r plot}
library(flowCore)
library(ggplot2)

fcs = read.FCS("~/temp/fcs/cytofkit_analyzedFCS/cytofkit_2016-05-20_PANEL 2_ZF_panel 2_F1632217_009.fcs", transformation=NULL,alter.names=TRUE)
theme_set(theme_bw(20))
t =as.data.frame(exprs(fcs))

ggplot(t , aes(x = tsne_1,y=tsne_2)) +geom_point()

```
